executable.title: Average Fiducials
executable.description: This program gets several fcsv file each one contains several landmarks with the same name but slightly different coordinates. For EACH landmark we compute the average coordination.

file.name: inputLandmarkListFile
file.label: Input landmark list file name
file.description: A single file for a list of filenames one per line.

file.name: outputLandmarkFile
file.label: Output file name
file.description: Ouput landmark file name that includes average values for landmarks (.fcsv or .wts)
